/usr/local/cuda-11.6/bin/g++ CMakeFiles/cu_mpi_smallpt.dir/src/kernel.cu.o CMakeFiles/cu_mpi_smallpt.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o cu_mpi_smallpt  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -lcudart -lcurand -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib"
